statements: SELECT * FROM game_schedule;
SELECT game_id, game_date FROM game_schedule;
SELECT game_id, home_team, away_team FROM game_schedule;
SELECT game_id, game_time FROM game_schedule WHERE game_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM game_schedule WHERE home_team = 'Team A';
SELECT * FROM game_schedule WHERE away_team = 'Team B';
SELECT game_date, game_time FROM game_schedule WHERE home_team = 'Team A';
SELECT game_id, game_date, game_time FROM game_schedule WHERE away_team = 'Team B';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM game_schedule;
SELECT AVG(game_id) FROM game_schedule;
SELECT MAX(game_id) FROM game_schedule;
SELECT MIN(game_id) FROM game_schedule;
SELECT game_date, COUNT(*) FROM game_schedule GROUP BY game_date;
SELECT home_team, COUNT(*) FROM game_schedule GROUP BY home_team;
SELECT away_team, AVG(game_id) FROM game_schedule GROUP BY away_team;
SELECT DISTINCT home_team FROM game_schedule;
SELECT game_id FROM game_schedule ORDER BY game_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM game_schedule LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM game_schedule OFFSET 5;
SELECT * FROM game_schedule WHERE home_team LIKE '%Team%';
SELECT * FROM game_schedule WHERE game_date = '2022-12-25';
SELECT home_team, away_team, game_date FROM game_schedule WHERE game_time BETWEEN '15:00' AND '18:00';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_games FROM game_schedule;
SELECT home_team, COUNT(*) AS total_home_games FROM game_schedule GROUP BY home_team;
SELECT * FROM game_schedule WHERE home_team = 'Team A' AND away_team = 'Team B';
SELECT game_id, game_date FROM game_schedule WHERE home_team LIKE 'Team%';
SELECT DISTINCT home_team FROM game_schedule ORDER BY home_team ASC;
SELECT AVG(TIMESTAMPDIFF(MINUTE, game_date, game_time)) AS avg_time_diff FROM game_schedule;
SELECT game_id, game_date, game_time FROM game_schedule WHERE home_team IN ('Team A', 'Team B');
SELECT MAX(game_date) AS latest_game_date FROM game_schedule;
SELECT * FROM game_schedule WHERE game_date > '2022-06-01' ORDER BY game_date DESC;
SELECT home_team, COUNT(*) AS total_home_games FROM game_schedule WHERE game_date > '2022-01-01' GROUP BY home_team HAVING total_home_games > 5;
SELECT game_id, game_date, game_time FROM game_schedule WHERE game_id NOT IN (SELECT game_id FROM game_results);
SELECT home_team, away_team, COUNT(*) AS total_games FROM game_schedule GROUP BY home_team, away_team HAVING total_games > 3;
SELECT game_id, game_date, game_time FROM game_schedule WHERE YEAR(game_date) = 2023;
SELECT home_team, away_team, game_date FROM game_schedule WHERE MONTH(game_date) = 5;
SELECT home_team, COUNT(*) AS total_home_games FROM game_schedule WHERE game_date BETWEEN '2023-04-01' AND '2023-06-30' GROUP BY home_team;
SELECT game_id, game_date, game_time FROM game_schedule WHERE away_team LIKE '%United%';
SELECT game_id, game_date, game_time FROM game_schedule WHERE TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, game_date, CURDATE()) > 30;
SELECT home_team, COUNT(*) AS total_home_games FROM game_schedule WHERE game_date < '2023-01-01' GROUP BY home_team;
SELECT * FROM games;
SELECT game_id, game_date FROM games WHERE game_time > '12:00:00';
SELECT game_id, game_date, game_time FROM games WHERE location = 'Stadium A';
SELECT location FROM games WHERE game_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, score FROM players WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE score > 100;
SELECT player_name, team_id FROM players WHERE player_id = 5;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM players WHERE score BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT team_id, COUNT(*) as player_count FROM players GROUP BY team_id;
SELECT game_id, game_date, location FROM games WHERE game_date > '2022-10-01' AND game_date < '2022-10-15';
SELECT player_name, score FROM players WHERE player_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT game_id, location FROM games WHERE location LIKE '%Stadium%';
SELECT player_id, player_name, score FROM players ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT team_id, AVG(score) as avg_score FROM players GROUP BY team_id;
SELECT game_id, game_date, location FROM games ORDER BY game_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM games JOIN players ON games.game_id = players.player_id;
SELECT player_name, game_date FROM players JOIN games ON players.player_id = games.game_id;
SELECT * FROM games WHERE location IN ('Stadium A', 'Stadium B');
SELECT * FROM players WHERE team_id NOT IN (1, 2);
SELECT * FROM games JOIN players ON games.game_id = players.game_id WHERE games.game_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_name, score FROM players WHERE score > 100 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT AVG(score) AS average_score FROM players WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT game_id, game_date, COUNT(player_id) AS total_players FROM games LEFT JOIN players ON games.game_id = players.game_id GROUP BY game_id;
SELECT * FROM games WHERE location LIKE '%stadium%';
SELECT game_id, game_date, location FROM games WHERE game_time BETWEEN '12:00:00' AND '18:00:00';
SELECT player_name, team_id, COUNT(game_id) AS total_games_played FROM players LEFT JOIN games ON players.player_id = games.player_id GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT MAX(score) AS highest_score, MIN(score) AS lowest_score FROM players;
SELECT game_id, game_date, location, team_id, player_name FROM games INNER JOIN players ON games.game_id = players.game_id WHERE player_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT game_date, location, SUM(score) AS total_score FROM games JOIN players ON games.game_id = players.game_id GROUP BY game_date, location;
SELECT AVG(score) AS average_score FROM players WHERE team_id = 2;
SELECT game_id, game_date, location FROM games WHERE game_time < '10:00:00';
SELECT player_name, team_id, MAX(score) AS highest_score FROM players GROUP BY team_id;
SELECT player_name, team_id, MIN(score) AS lowest_score FROM players GROUP BY team_id;
SELECT * FROM games WHERE game_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT game_id, game_date, location FROM games WHERE location NOT LIKE '%field%';
SELECT game_date, game_time, location FROM games WHERE game_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT player_name, score, team_id FROM players WHERE team_id = 1 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT game_id, game_date, location FROM games WHERE game_date > '2022-06-01' AND game_date < '2022-09-01';
SELECT player_name, team_id, SUM(score) AS total_score FROM players WHERE team_id = 1 GROUP BY player_name;
SELECT * FROM game_schedule;
SELECT game_id, game_date FROM game_schedule;
SELECT game_id, game_date, game_time FROM game_schedule WHERE broadcast_channel='ABC';
SELECT * FROM player_statistics;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player_statistics;
SELECT player_id, player_name, points_scored FROM player_statistics WHERE assists > 5;
SELECT * FROM team_info;
SELECT team_id, team_name FROM team_info;
SELECT team_id, team_name, coach_name FROM team_info WHERE home_arena='Madison Square Garden';
SELECT game_schedule.game_date, team_info.team_name FROM game_schedule INNER JOIN team_info ON game_schedule.game_id = team_info.team_id;
SELECT player_statistics.player_name, game_schedule.game_date FROM player_statistics INNER JOIN game_schedule ON player_statistics.player_id = game_schedule.game_id;
SELECT player_statistics.player_name, player_statistics.points_scored, team_info.team_name FROM player_statistics INNER JOIN team_info ON player_statistics.player_id = team_info.team_id;
SELECT player_statistics.player_name, player_statistics.assists, team_info.coach_name FROM player_statistics INNER JOIN team_info ON player_statistics.player_id = team_info.team_id;
SELECT team_info.team_name, COUNT(player_id) AS total_players FROM team_info LEFT JOIN player_statistics ON team_info.team_id = player_statistics.player_id GROUP BY team_info.team_name;
SELECT MAX(points_scored) AS max_points FROM player_statistics;
SELECT AVG(assists) AS avg_assists FROM player_statistics;
SELECT MIN(points_scored) AS min_points FROM player_statistics;
SELECT team_info.team_name, SUM(points_scored) AS total_points FROM player_statistics INNER JOIN team_info ON player_statistics.player_id = team_info.team_id GROUP BY team_info.team_name;
SELECT team_info.team_name, AVG(rebounds) AS avg_rebounds FROM player_statistics INNER JOIN team_info ON player_statistics.player_id = team_info.team_id GROUP BY team_info.team_name;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_games, team_info.team_name FROM game_schedule INNER JOIN team_info ON game_schedule.game_id = team_info.team_id GROUP BY team_info.team_name;
SELECT * FROM game_schedule LIMIT 5 OFFSET 10;
SELECT game_id, game_date, game_time, broadcast_channel FROM game_schedule;
SELECT * FROM player_statistics WHERE points_scored > 20 AND assists > 10;
SELECT team_id, team_name, coach_name FROM team_info WHERE team_name LIKE 'Lakers%';
SELECT player_name, points_scored, assists FROM player_statistics WHERE points_scored > 30 OR assists > 20;
SELECT game_id, game_date, game_time, broadcast_channel FROM game_schedule WHERE game_date > '2022-01-01' AND game_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT team_id, team_name, home_arena FROM team_info WHERE coach_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT * FROM player_statistics ORDER BY points_scored DESC;
SELECT game_id, game_date, game_time, broadcast_channel FROM game_schedule WHERE broadcast_channel IN ('ESPN', 'ABC');
SELECT player_name, SUM(points_scored) AS total_points FROM player_statistics GROUP BY player_name;
SELECT game_id, game_date, game_time, broadcast_channel FROM game_schedule WHERE game_id = 1001;
SELECT team_name, AVG(points_scored) AS avg_points FROM player_statistics INNER JOIN team_info ON player_statistics.team_id = team_info.team_id GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT player_name, points_scored, assists FROM player_statistics WHERE assists > points_scored;
SELECT player_name, points_scored, assists FROM player_statistics WHERE points_scored < 10 OR assists < 5;
SELECT team_name, COUNT(player_id) AS num_players FROM player_statistics INNER JOIN team_info ON player_statistics.team_id = team_info.team_id GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT game_date, COUNT(game_id) AS num_games FROM game_schedule GROUP BY game_date HAVING COUNT(game_id) > 2;
SELECT player_name, points_scored, assists FROM player_statistics WHERE points_scored BETWEEN 20 AND 30 AND assists BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT team_name, MAX(points_scored) AS max_points FROM player_statistics INNER JOIN team_info ON player_statistics.team_id = team_info.team_id GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT game_id, game_date, game_time, broadcast_channel FROM game_schedule ORDER BY game_date ASC, game_time ASC;

SELECT team_name, coach_name, COUNT(player_id) AS num_players FROM player_statistics INNER JOIN team_info ON player_statistics.team_id = team_info.team_id GROUP BY team_name, coach_name HAVING COUNT(player_id) > 5;
SELECT DISTINCT coach_name FROM team_info ORDER BY coach_name;
SELECT * FROM game_schedule;
SELECT game_id, game_date FROM game_schedule;
SELECT home_team, away_team FROM game_schedule;
SELECT * FROM player_statistics;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player_statistics;
SELECT games_played, points_scored FROM player_statistics;
SELECT * FROM team_stats;
SELECT team_id, team_name FROM team_stats;
SELECT total_games_played, total_wins, total_losses FROM team_stats;
SELECT * FROM broadcast_schedule;
SELECT broadcast_id, game_id FROM broadcast_schedule;
SELECT broadcast_date, broadcast_time FROM broadcast_schedule;
SELECT broadcast_channel FROM broadcast_schedule;
SELECT game_id, game_date, game_time, home_team, away_team FROM game_schedule;
SELECT player_id, player_name, team_name, games_played, points_scored FROM player_statistics;
SELECT team_id, team_name, total_games_played, total_wins, total_losses FROM team_stats;
SELECT broadcast_id, game_id, broadcast_date, broadcast_time, broadcast_channel FROM broadcast_schedule;
SELECT game_id, game_date, home_team, away_team FROM game_schedule;
SELECT player_name, games_played, points_scored FROM player_statistics;
SELECT team_name, total_games_played, total_wins FROM team_stats;
SELECT * FROM game_schedule;
SELECT game_id, game_date, game_time FROM game_schedule WHERE home_team='Lakers';
SELECT game_id, home_team, away_team FROM game_schedule WHERE game_date='2022-10-25';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM player_statistics WHERE team_name='Warriors';
SELECT player_name, games_played FROM player_statistics WHERE points_scored > 20;
SELECT team_name, total_wins FROM team_stats ORDER BY total_wins DESC;
SELECT team_name, total_losses FROM team_stats WHERE total_games_played > 10;
SELECT * FROM team_stats WHERE total_wins > total_losses;
SELECT bs.broadcast_date, bs.broadcast_time, bs.broadcast_channel, gs.team_name FROM broadcast_schedule bs JOIN game_schedule gs ON bs.game_id = gs.game_id;
SELECT gs.game_date, gs.game_time, bs.broadcast_channel FROM game_schedule gs JOIN broadcast_schedule bs ON gs.game_id = bs.game_id WHERE gs.home_team='Rockets';
SELECT team_name, total_games_played, total_wins, total_losses FROM team_stats WHERE total_wins >= 15 AND total_losses < 5;
SELECT player_name, points_scored, team_name FROM player_statistics WHERE points_scored = (SELECT MAX(points_scored) FROM player_statistics);
SELECT team_name, COUNT(player_id) AS num_players FROM player_statistics GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT team_name, AVG(points_scored) AS avg_points FROM player_statistics GROUP BY team_name HAVING AVG(points_scored) > 15;
SELECT broadcast_channel, COUNT(broadcast_id) AS num_broadcasts FROM broadcast_schedule GROUP BY broadcast_channel;
SELECT game_date, COUNT(game_id) AS num_games, SUM(total_wins) AS total_wins FROM game_schedule gs JOIN team_stats ts ON gs.home_team = ts.team_name GROUP BY game_date;

SELECT ts.team_name, COUNT(bs.broadcast_id) AS num_broadcasts FROM team_stats ts JOIN game_schedule gs ON ts.team_name = gs.home_team JOIN broadcast_schedule bs ON gs.game_id = bs.game_id GROUP BY ts.team_name;
SELECT ps.player_name, ts.team_name, ps.points_scored FROM player_statistics ps JOIN team_stats ts ON ps.team_name = ts.team_name WHERE ts.total_wins > ts.total_losses;

SELECT gs.game_id, gs.game_date, ts.team_name AS home_team, ts.total_wins AS home_team_wins, bs.broadcast_channel FROM game_schedule gs JOIN team_stats ts ON gs.home_team = ts.team_name JOIN broadcast_schedule bs ON gs.game_id = bs.game_id;

SELECT gs.game_id, gs.game_date, ts.team_name AS away_team, ts.total_losses AS away_team_losses, bs.broadcast_channel FROM game_schedule gs JOIN team_stats ts ON gs.away_team = ts.team_name JOIN broadcast_schedule bs ON gs.game_id = bs.game_id;
SELECT * FROM games;
SELECT game_date, game_time, stadium_name FROM games;
SELECT game_id, stadium_name FROM games WHERE game_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM teams;
SELECT team_name, coach_name FROM teams;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_name, position, age FROM players WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM player_stats;
SELECT player_id, game_id, points_scored FROM player_stats WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT broadcast_channel FROM games;
SELECT * FROM broadcasts;
SELECT broadcast_date, broadcast_time, rating FROM broadcasts WHERE broadcast_id = 1;
SELECT team_name, city, country FROM teams WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT player_name, position, age FROM players ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT team_name, coach_name, city FROM teams WHERE city = 'Los Angeles';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM games;
SELECT AVG(points_scored), MAX(rebounds), MIN(assists) FROM player_stats;
SELECT team_name, player_name, position FROM teams JOIN players ON teams.team_id = players.team_id;
SELECT game_id, SUM(points_scored) AS total_points FROM player_stats GROUP BY game_id;
SELECT broadcast_id, broadcast_date, broadcast_time, rating FROM broadcasts ORDER BY rating DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM games;
SELECT game_id, game_date, game_time, stadium_name FROM games;
SELECT game_id, game_date, stadium_name, broadcast_channel FROM games WHERE game_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT team_name, city, country FROM teams;
SELECT player_id, player_name, team_id, position FROM players;
SELECT player_name, position, age FROM players WHERE age > 25;
SELECT player_name, team_name, position FROM players JOIN teams ON players.team_id = teams.team_id;
SELECT game_id, points_scored, rebounds, assists FROM player_stats;
SELECT game_id, player_name, points_scored, rebounds, assists FROM player_stats JOIN players ON player_stats.player_id = players.player_id;
SELECT team_name, coach_name, city, country, player_name, position FROM teams JOIN players ON teams.team_id = players.team_id;
SELECT broadcast_date, broadcast_time, rating FROM broadcasts;
SELECT game_id, game_date, broadcast_date, broadcast_time, rating FROM games JOIN broadcasts ON games.game_id = broadcasts.game_id;
SELECT broadcast_date, broadcast_time, rating FROM broadcasts WHERE rating > 4.5;

SELECT game_date, game_time, stadium_name, broadcast_channel, player_name, points_scored FROM games JOIN player_stats ON games.game_id = player_stats.game_id JOIN players ON player_stats.player_id = players.player_id WHERE points_scored > 20;
SELECT player_name, position, points_scored, rebounds, assists FROM players JOIN player_stats ON players.player_id = player_stats.player_id ORDER BY points_scored DESC;
SELECT team_name, coach_name, city, country, COUNT(player_name) AS total_players FROM teams JOIN players ON teams.team_id = players.team_id GROUP BY team_name;
SELECT team_name, coach_name, city, country, AVG(age) AS avg_age FROM teams JOIN players ON teams.team_id = players.team_id GROUP BY team_name HAVING AVG(age) > 25;

SELECT game_date, game_time, stadium_name, broadcast_channel, player_name, points_scored FROM games JOIN player_stats ON games.game_id = player_stats.game_id JOIN players ON player_stats.player_id = players.player_id WHERE player_name LIKE 'L%';

SELECT player_name, position, points_scored, rebounds, assists FROM players JOIN player_stats ON players.player_id = player_stats.player_id UNION SELECT player_name, position, points_scored, rebounds, assists FROM players JOIN player_stats ON players.player_id = player_stats.player_id WHERE position = 'Guard';
